participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and nurturing, always seeking knowledge and adventure.
participant_1.background: i started a new job as a pa three months ago. i'm pregnant with my first child. i read a book every week. i live with my husband in pennsylvania. my favorite kind of movie is a documentary.

participant_2.name: Daniel
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and competitive, loves to engage in physical activities and enjoys the thrill of the game.
participant_2.background: i live in a three storey house. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i'm a professional tennis player. i am married to a doctor.
